plot: A couple get more than they bargained for when they get lost in the woods and take shelter in an abandoned cabin for the night.
title: Apparition
plot_es: A couple get more than they bargained for when they get lost in the woods and take shelter in an abandoned cabin for the night.
plot_en: A couple get more than they bargained for when they get lost in the woods and take shelter in an abandoned cabin for the night.
